snippet: The original art for the cover of Issue No. 2 of “The Dark Knight Returns,” right, will be sold next month by Heritage Auctions for an estimated price of more than $500,000.
abstract: Original art for cover of Issue No 2 of Frank Miller's The Dark Knight Returns, which helped usher in new era of sophistication in comic books, will be sold in August by Heritage Auctions for estimated price of more than $500,000.
lead_paragraph: The original art for the cover of Issue No. 2 of “The Dark Knight Returns,” right, will be sold next month by Heritage Auctions for an estimated price of more than $500,000.

headline.print_headline: ‘Dark Knight Returns’ Cover Art Goes for Sale
headline.main: ‘Dark Knight Returns’ Cover Art Goes for Sale
